sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>claw</radical> radical and the <kanji>claw</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Ravishing!
readingMnemonic: You’ve got not one <reading>tumor</reading> (<ja>つま</ja>), but <reading>too ma</reading>ny (<ja>つめ</ja>) tumors and you need to claw them out with your sharp <kanji>claw</kanji>. One tumor is one tumor too many. Cut them out with your claw!
readingInfo: Imagine you have too many tumors. Feel the claw digging into your flesh and removing the tumors. It really hurts, but it is necessary.
